Won by Smash Won by Net Won by Clear Won by Error +1 -1 Match Summary Close
// =================================== // match summary page text // =================================== Match Summary OK // =================================== // Home page welcome text // =================================== Hello badminton Players: 

 The application is developed to record score during badminton tournament by a small group of volunteers. 

 This version is specifically meant for 10th Finland Chinese tournament, as the event represents a great milestone for Chinese badminton community 

 This is still a basic version. Some Pro functionalities have been either disabled or under construction. 

 This App will be further developed in the future. 

 Thanks for the effort by Ma Xiao, Ding Hong and Wei Chao 

 11.2015, Espoo
